plot: People think monks are different than everyone else. They are, but they aren't. Yes, and no. A personal portrait of Thai Buddhist monk Phrasuputh Chainikom and his search for happiness.
title: The Monk
plot_es: People think monks are different than everyone else. They are, but they aren't. Yes, and no. A personal portrait of Thai Buddhist monk Phrasuputh Chainikom and his search for happiness.
plot_en: People think monks are different than everyone else. They are, but they aren't. Yes, and no. A personal portrait of Thai Buddhist monk Phrasuputh Chainikom and his search for happiness.
